trans-unit.source: Provides a <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder"></xref> object used at design time to apply control skins to controls.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder"> </xref> objeto usado em tempo de design para aplicar capas de controle para controles.

trans-unit.source: Page developers and control authors do not use the SkinBuilder class directly.
trans-unit.target: Os desenvolvedores de páginas e autores de controle não usam a classe SkinBuilder diretamente.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET designer builders use the SkinBuilder class in conjunction with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider> class and the <xref:System.Web.UI.IThemeResolutionService> interface to apply themes and their respective control skins to controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: Construtores de designer do ASP.NET usam a classe SkinBuilder em conjunto com o <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider>classe e o <xref:System.Web.UI.IThemeResolutionService>interface aplicar temas e suas capas de controle do respectivos controles em tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.IThemeResolutionService> </xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider>

trans-unit.source: To apply themes at design time, the base <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> class calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.SkinBuilder.ApplyTheme%2A> method whenever a control's child control tree is built.
trans-unit.target: Para aplicar temas em tempo de design, a base de <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder>classe chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.SkinBuilder.ApplyTheme%2A>sempre que a árvore de controle filho do controle é criada.</xref:System.Web.UI.SkinBuilder.ApplyTheme%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.SkinBuilder"></xref> class, setting the control with which the builder is associated, the general <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder"></xref> object provided by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider"></xref> object for the control, and a path to the theme file.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.SkinBuilder"> </xref> classe, definindo o controle ao qual o construtor está associado, o geral <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder"> </xref> objeto fornecido pelo <xref href="System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider"> </xref> objeto para o controle e um caminho para o arquivo de tema.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider.GetSkinBuilder%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider> class to return a <xref:System.Web.UI.SkinBuilder> object for the control specified in the `control` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor é chamado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider.GetSkinBuilder%2A>método o <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider>classe para retornar um <xref:System.Web.UI.SkinBuilder>objeto para o controle especificado no `control` parâmetro.</xref:System.Web.UI.SkinBuilder> </xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider> </xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider.GetSkinBuilder%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider"></xref> that encapsulates theme information for controls in a designer environment.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider"> </xref> que encapsula as informações de tema para controles em um ambiente de designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> with which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.SkinBuilder"></xref> is associated.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"> </xref> com a qual o <xref href="System.Web.UI.SkinBuilder"> </xref> está associado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.SkinBuilder.ApplyTheme*> method applies a control skin to this control and returns it.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.SkinBuilder.ApplyTheme*>método aplica uma capa de controle para este controle e retorna o proprietário.</xref:System.Web.UI.SkinBuilder.ApplyTheme*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder"></xref> provided by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider"></xref> for the control's type.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder"> </xref> fornecidos pelo <xref href="System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider"> </xref> para o tipo do controle.

trans-unit.source: The absolute path to the theme file.
trans-unit.target: O caminho absoluto para o arquivo de tema.

trans-unit.source: Applies a theme and a control skin to the current control at design time, if a <xref href="System.Web.UI.SkinBuilder"></xref> object is associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: Aplica um tema e uma capa de controle para o controle atual em tempo de design, se um <xref href="System.Web.UI.SkinBuilder"> </xref> objeto está associado com o controle.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.SkinBuilder> objects are associated with controls at design time by specifying an <xref:System.Web.UI.IThemeResolutionService> instance for the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> object of a control that supplies a <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.SkinBuilder>objetos estão associados a controles em tempo de design, especificando um <xref:System.Web.UI.IThemeResolutionService>de instância para o <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder>objeto de um controle que fornece um <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider> </xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> </xref:System.Web.UI.IThemeResolutionService></xref:System.Web.UI.SkinBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider> object can return a <xref:System.Web.UI.SkinBuilder> object for a given control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider>objeto pode retornar um <xref:System.Web.UI.SkinBuilder>objeto para um dado controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.SkinBuilder> </xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider>

trans-unit.source: The control instance to which the theme or style sheet theme and any control skin was applied.
trans-unit.target: A instância de controle para que o tema ou tema de folha de estilo e qualquer controle capa foi aplicada.

trans-unit.source: This is the same instance passed to the builder's <xref:System.Web.UI.SkinBuilder.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Essa é a mesma instância passada para o construtor <xref:System.Web.UI.SkinBuilder.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: This method will return <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no control was passed to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: Esse método retornará <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se nenhum controle foi transmitido ao construtor.
